channel.title: Nitro-Scape V2 {A whole new meaning to rsps} [need coder]
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev%201.png[/img]
Info: Server Name:Nitro-Scape V2 Client Base: Project Insanity Server based off of: iHyBriD PvP V3 Owner: Owner Nitro
Hi My name is Nitro and I am wanting to get a team of great coders together to make the new reality in RSPS this idea could go big if I get a team together.
The server is going to start out like this: First a Player creates a new account and will spawn in a dungeon. An interface will pop up with a class selection = ranger, skiller, mager, melee. Once they have selected there class whatever class they chose is what starter items they will recieve to perform specifics for their skill and this next part is what i need the develepment team for , example: if they selected ranger as their class, in the levels tab with all of the players stats instead of having all 21 skills they will only have ranging skills such as... Range Combat Skill, Bow Crafting Skill, Arrow Crafting Skill, Woodcutting, Mining, Smithing, and Armour Crafting Skill. and when you select a diffrent class such as mage or melee the skills will be diffrent. :)
Now for another part I need a team for...I am wanting to create my dungeons custom and make them with my team so i need a good coder with knowledge on editing Project Insanity maps to make our custom dungeons.
This server has all 634 items and 602 npcs, I do not wish to have 508 maps because it is laggy and messed up in places
These are the Code Positions I need:
Map Editor/Designer(Will get paid 20$ a month + 50% of all Donations!!) If you are aplieing for this job post this below.... Name: On a scale of 1-10 how dedicated are you to this job if accepted: How much knowledge do you know on editing Project Insanity Maps: Other Description of yourself on why I should accept you: Skype Name: Email:
Source and Client Coder(along with me)(gets paid 5$ for every job I ask him to do) this job requires knowledge on being able to produce codes on how to make a teleporter not allow weapons or armour in inventory or weilding before teleporting and more usefull dungeoneering codes for the server. ( yes I am Smart with Java and I know alot of codes I just need a team for this project I am a good coder dont worry) post this below if aplieing for this job..... Name: Your dedication if accepted to this job 1-10: Your knowledge on sources and clients: description on why else I should accept you: Skype name: email:
Below are some of our pictures for this upcomming server:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev%202.PNG[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev3.PNG[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev4.PNG[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev5.PNG[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev7.PNG[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22460987/dev8.PNG[/img]
Thanks for your intrest if you have further questions add me on skype: zak1206 or message me on here :)
and yes I am an amazing Interface maker and coded all these interfaces myself...

item.title: Nitro-Scape V2 {A whole new meaning to rsps} [need coder]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:16, topic:393038”][quote author=owner nitro link=topic=490209.msg3584566#msg3584566 date=1304054567]
I do not wish to have 508 maps because it is laggy and messed up in places[/quote]

They’re not laggy, wtf? They only lagg the first time you start up the client to load them all, but after that they’re fine. And if you just dump the maps/objects correctly they won’t be missing anything. Penor’s 508 maps (im assuming yours talking about his) are terrible.[/quote]

Exactly.

Read full topic
